articles.title: Hurricane Sam Rapidly Intensifying; Forecast to Become Category 4 in Eastern Atlantic | The Weather Channel - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: It's small, but strengthening quickly. Here's the latest, complete briefing on Hurricane Sam. - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com
articles.content:
At a Glance
  • Sam became the eighteenth named storm of the 2021 Atlantic hurricane season Thursday.
  • It rapidly intensified into the seventh hurricane of the season by Friday morning.
